=== Join Our Team ===

To become member of the <nowiki>[[MontenegroTeam | Ubuntu LoCo Montenegro]]</nowiki>, please: 
* Join <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-me | our team on Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* Join <nowiki>[[http://forums.ubuntu-me.org | our forum]]</nowiki>
* Join <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/groups/73079246420/ | our Facebook group]]</nowiki>
* Subscribe to our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/Ubuntu-me | mailing list]]</nowiki>
* Professional users are encouraged to join <nowiki>[[http://www.linkedin.com/groups/Ubuntu-LoCo-Montenegro-4080392 | our LinkedIn group]]</nowiki>
* Participate and get involved (see "'''How You Can Help'''" and "'''As a Member'''" sections below)

'''NOTE''': New members are encouraged to provide as much information about yourself in your Launchpad (e-mail and name is required) in order for us to approve your application in a timely fashion. This measure is to avoid spamming.

You also can join the #ubuntu-me channel on irc.freenode.net for online discussion.

=== How You Can Help ===

If you would like to support <nowiki>[[MontenegroTeam | Ubuntu LoCo Montenegro]]</nowiki>, please consider:
* Spreading the word to your family members, relatives, colleagues, friends, etc.<<BR>>
* Participating in localization, translations, and packaging projects<<BR>>
* If you want to donate, the best way is to sponsor to help with Ubuntu caps, shirts, CDs and DVDs, as well as to support expenses for domain and hosting<<BR>>

=== As a Member ===

If you would like to get involved with the team efforts, you can help by:
* Sharing your ideas, knowledge, experience<<BR>>
* Promoting events for Ubuntu as well as other open source and free software<<BR>>
* Keeping our communication channels (mailing list, website and forum, IRC channel, social media) active<<BR>>
* Starting or assisting our projects or events<<BR>>
* Showing & contributing in team meetups<<BR>>
* Contribute in updating these wiki pages and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-me.org | our wiki]]</nowiki>
